Package org.apache.fop.fonts.autodetect

A collection of classes that aid in the autodetection of installed system fonts.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FontFinder Implementers provide find method for searching native operating system for available fonts.
 

Class Summary
FontFileFinder Helps to autodetect/locate available operating system fonts.
FontInfoFinder Attempts to determine correct FontInfo
MacFontDirFinder Mac font directory finder
NativeFontDirFinder Native font finder base class
UnixFontDirFinder Unix font directory finder
WindowsFontDirFinder FontFinder for native Windows platforms
 

Package org.apache.fop.fonts.autodetect Description

A collection of classes that aid in the autodetection of installed system fonts.
